caption.title: Proportion of pyrogenic Fe in total aerosol Fe and labile Fe.
caption.p: Percentage of total aerosol Fe from combustion aerosols ( A, D, and G) and the percentage of labile Fe from combustion aerosols to the total atmospheric Fe deposition flux (combustion and dust) calculated from three models with atmospheric processing ( B, E, and H) and without atmospheric processing ( C, F, and I).
